title: Senator Oluremi Tinubu Dream Centre | OAU Ile-Ife
description: An inspiration and mentorship hub at Obafemi Awolowo University, Ile-Ife. A Digital Information Hub and Mentorship Sanctuary combining AI, digital technology, and storytelling to inspire youth toward responsible leadership.
